ygData.subject: RE: AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm this is disturbing.. I liked the fact that lowbies couldn t get the armor unless they did it themselves. My opinion is that all class specific armor should
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm this is disturbing.. I liked the fact that lowbies couldn't get the
armor unless they did it themselves. My opinion is that all class specific
armor should be No Drop, if you can't do the quest with the character that
will be wearing the armor then you shouldn't have it. (But of course i'm one
of those that thinks there should be level limits on armor and equipment
anyway.. I hate seeing lvl 10 and under Sk's with a DR or similar)..

Anyway... I think I'll feedback it as well when I get on tonight..

Oh something that was kind of bugging me, is there anyway to delete a spell
from your spell book? The since the new lifetaps didn't overwrite the
existing spells I still have them in my book (and obviously can't use
them).. I've moved them to like page 15 or so, but would like to delete
them. Any ideas?

Enjoy

Thomas


-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 11:27 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

I came across some disturbing info last night...
Darkforge Armor is no longer NO DROP.
All the pieces that I have that WERE NO DROP, arent
any longer.
This is bad,bad,bad,bad....
Item farming was bad enough before.
Having the DF armor NO DROP saved us from having to
compete with other who want the items to sell or twink
their level 5 SKs with.
Now we are back to square one.
BTW...Why can ANYONE do these quests?
It is SK only armor.
And the same should go for all the other class armors
as well. These quests are supposed to be for a
specific class, yet anyone can do them?
Thats just stupid.

I for one am doing the FEEDBACK thing telling them of
my extreme displeasure at this.


Oh yeah..for some odd reason..the Hulking Gorillas in
the LTR now drop Decaying everytime
*shrug*..ya got me on that one

Bathory D'Allatu
